DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Trial Investigate Safety Tolerability PF-06649751
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year Female subject non childbearing potential meet least one follow criterion : Achieved postmenopausal status , define : cessation regular menses least 12 consecutive month alternative pathological physiological cause ; serum follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) level confirm postmenopausal status ; Have undergone document hysterectomy and/or bilateral oophorectomy ; Have medically confirm ovarian failure . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption . Subjects epilepsy , history epilepsy , condition low seizure threshold , seizures etiology ( include substance drug withdrawal ) , increase risk seizure evidence history EEG epileptiform activity . Subjects history childhood seizure , history head trauma loss consciousness require hospitalization overnight exclude well .
